text:
FØCAL | Cambridge/Boston | ONSITE, REMOTE-possible | http://f0cal.com/

---FØCAL---

Build once. Build everywhere. -- computer-aided design for computer vision.

Next-generation HPC image processing backplane that delivers unparalleled performance and predictability, cloud to edge.

We have an innovative team and are looking for outstanding contributors in a lot of areas - feel free to reach out.

  - contribute to a fast-paced venture-funded startup in an exciting field

  - get mentorship from senior developers

  - invent!
Please email (see my profile) with:

  - your development experience

  - technologies you hope to learn or things you find interesting

  - anything else!
keywords: Python, Computer Vision, Linux, Jenkins, SaltStack, Docker, Microsoft Azure, AWS, Devops, Cloud Architect
